org.apache.hadoop.io.serializer.avro

インタフェース AvroReflectSerializable


  • @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface AvroReflectSerializable
    Tag interface for Avro 'reflect' serializable classes. Classes implementing this interface can be serialized/deserialized using AvroReflectSerialization.
